sentences.english: Objective To summarize the experience of total gastrectomy for gastric carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的分析和總結胃癌全胃切除術治療經驗。

sentences.english: Methods All the 48 patients were treated with EFP regimen.
sentences.chinese: 方法對48例進展期胃癌病人用EFP方案治療。

sentences.english: Objective To study the relationship between surgical maneuvers and micrometastasis of gastric cancer.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討手術操作與胃癌微轉移的關係。

sentences.english: We are still learning a lot about the connection between H. pylori infection and gastric cancer.
sentences.chinese: 我們還在繼續研究幽門螺桿菌感染與胃癌之間的關係。

sentences.english: Does Helicobacter pylori eradication therapy for peptic ulcer prevent gastric cancer?
sentences.chinese: 幽門螺桿菌根除治療消化性潰瘍是否能預防胃癌？

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the clinical outcomes of total resection of lesser curvature used for radical treatment of distal gastric carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討胃小彎全切術在遠端胃癌根治術中的應用。

sentences.english: Objective To identify intraoperatively the feasibility of lymphatic mapping with methylene.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究亞甲藍術中定位胃癌前哨淋巴結的可行性。

sentences.english: Objective To investigate an effective method for detecting lymphatic micrometastasis in gastric carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討檢測胃癌淋巴結微轉移的有效方法。

sentences.english: Objective To observe the effects of chemo-endocrine therapy on gastric carcinoma (GC).
sentences.chinese: 目的觀察胃癌患者化學內分泌治療的效果。

sentences.english: Meanwhile, Aili finds out that she has contracted gastric cancer.
sentences.chinese: 其間，艾莉驚悉自己得了胃癌。

sentences.english: The stomach cancer patient epigastrium ache, through will hold back will also have the alleviation.
sentences.chinese: 胃癌患者上腹部疼痛，通過按壓也會有所緩解。

sentences.english: Objective To discuss the long term curative effect of adjuvant FAM chemotherapy after radical operation of gastric carcinoma.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討胃癌根治術後應用輔助化療患者的遠期療效。

sentences.english: OBJECTIVE To study the anti-neoplastic effect of Haimiding and its mechanism.
sentences.chinese: 目的研究海嘧啶抗胃癌作用及作用機制。

sentences.english: Aim: Studying inhibitory effects of Genistein on BGC-823 gastric cancer cells with different concentration.
sentences.chinese: 進一步研究染料木素誘導胃癌細胞凋亡的分子機制。

sentences.english: Objective To explore the value of transendoscopic miniatura ultrasound in diagnosing gastric carcinoma and gastric eminence lesions.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討內鏡超聲對胃癌及胃隆起性病變的診斷。

sentences.english: H.pylori has been linked to ulcers and stomach cancers.
sentences.chinese: 已經證實這種細菌和潰瘍和胃癌有關。

definition: cancers of the nose and throat/nasopharyngeal carcinoma (NPC)
to become cancerous/transformation to malignancy (of body cells)
